ygData.subject: Group damage - was Revised? Patch Update today
ygData.msgSnippet: This is very sad.  I was shocked when I found out this wasn t the way it worked to begin with.  Does Verant condone kill stealing?  Does Verant want to
ygData.messageBody:
This is very sad. I was shocked when I found out this wasn't the way
it worked to begin with. Does Verant condone kill stealing? Does
Verant want to discourage grouping and promote obnoxious necro
soloing? What's the deal here? The less people want to group the
harder it is to be a bard...

Bujold (waiting for the middle earth mfrp)
Xegony
21st level (only took one week to level - a record!)


______________________________ Reply Separator _________________________________
Subject: [eqbards] Revised? Patch Update today
Author: Non-HP-sklug (sklug@...) at HP-ColSprings,mimegw5
Date: 9/28/1999 11:17 AM


From: "Steven S. Klug" <sklug@...>

Did they revise the patch message? It now says the group damage getting
the exp only has been applied to the Fennin Ro server. Those bums! How
long have we all been waiting for this change? *sigh*

Laluni Songhammer, 27th level bard of E'Ci
(who has been campaigning for this since Phase 1 beta)
Steven S. Klug
-- sklug@...
